name: graphql-language-service-parser
description: An online parser for GraphQL for use in syntax-highlighters and code intelligence tools

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run check
scripts.lint: eslint src || (printf '\033[33mTry: \033[7m npm run lint -- --fix \033[0m\n' && exit 1)
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-flow
